about_the_game:
Pet Cam is a small horror story game where the player takes on the role of a female protagonist named Arya. Over time, the girl's shocking past unfolds before her eyes.

SPOILER ALERT - For those who can't get anything other than noob ending: place hammer at table on right to bed before picking call up, so that you can pick it up when you need it

Gameplay :

Within a gameplay time of 25-30 minutes, the game offers multiple endings for players to explore.

This game is primarily a first-person walking simulator, focusing on everyday tasks and exploration in both Arya’s house and a mysterious location

Key Features:

  • Immersive Daily Life Simulation: Help Arya navigate her day-to-day routine, from getting ready for work to completing small tasks in her home.

  • Unnerving Atmosphere: Explore Arya’s home and areas where the atmosphere becomes increasingly unsettling with every step.

  • Exploration-Based Narrative: Dive deep into a story driven by environmental clues and interactions as you unravel the mystery behind the horror.

  • Walking Simulator Mechanics: A slow-burn, immersive experience that rewards players for taking their time to explore and pay attention to details.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: GTX 1660s or AMD equivalent

short_description: Arya living a peaceful life by day, but each night, an eerie phone call from her father haunts her sleep. One night, the call turns into a nightmare, unraveling a terrifying story about her past. Can you uncover the truth before it consumes you?
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Hindi, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
